strings.string: This Task explain how you get Pocket Code on your Mobile Device.
In this task you get all the stuff that you need for your first program in "Pocket Code".
This task shows how to open the project and get started for coding.
This task shows how to add a variable.
This task explains how to add and label a new variable.
This task shows how to set a value for a variable.
This task shows how to add a "Forever" brick.
In This task we add some more bricks and modify the "Place at" - brick.
In this task we modify the "Set size to" - brick and change the values of the "Set variable" - bricks.
This task shows how to add a "If 1 is true then" - brick and how you can modify it.
This task explains how to add and change the "When I receive" - brick.
In this task the target object gets modified.
In this task the target object gets modified.
In this task the target object gets completed.
In this task the object "parcel" gets modified.
In this task the object "parcel" gets modified.
In this task the object "parcel" gets modified.
In this task the object "parcel" gets modified.
In this task we modify the object "Background".
1.) Tap "Explore" in PocketCode on your Mobile Device.
2.) Tap on the CSEDWeek-Banner you see on the first page.
1.) Pull down the menu and tap on the program.
4.) Drag and drop the "Set variable" - brick under the "When program started" - brick.
4.) Drag and drop the "Forever" - brick under the variable - bricks.
1.) Insert the shown bricks under the "Forever" - brick.
4.) Tap "200" , tap "Variables" then choose "y" and tap "OK".
Change the value of the first "Set variable" - brick to "-3".
On the second "Set variable" - brick tap in the field "0.0""
3.) Check if your inserted formula matches the formula in the screenshot and tap "OK".
Add "If 1 is true then" - brick and place it under the last "Change variable" - brick
3.) Check if your formula matches the formula in the screenshot and tap "OK".
1.) Add "Change variable" - brick and modify the value like above.
Place it under the last brick ("End of loop").
3.) Tap the field "message 1", choose "New" and insert "restart".
4.) Change values of "Set Value" bricks like above .
1.) Tap the "back" - button on your device.
3.) Now you should see this screen on your device.
2.) Add the above shown bricks and modify the values seen above.
3.) Add the next bricks like above.
3.) Tap the field "0.0" and insert the formula "random(-400/400)".
4.) Repeat Step 1-3, label the variable "goaly" and set the value to random (400/-700).
1.) Add a "Place at" - brick and set the field "100" to variable "goalx" and the field "200" to variable "goaly".
2.) Check if your values matches the values you see in the above screen.
3.) Tap back until you see this screen on your device.
Tap the field "restart" at the "When i receive" - brick and create a new message "start".
Change values of "Place at" - brick to "x" and "y".
1.) Add the above shown bricks under the last "Place at" - brick.
2.) Modify "Change Y by" to "-5", then tap field "If 1 is true".
Insert the above shown formula and tap "OK".
Change field "100" to "position_x" and field "200" to "goaly+100".
Tap the field "Broadcast" and create a new message "win".
2.) Add the obove shown bricks and modify the values.
3.) Tap "back" until you see this screen on your device and tap the object "restart" and choose "Scripts".
1.) Add the above shown bricks and modify the values.
2.) Add the above shown bricks and set the "Broadcast" - message to "restart".
3.) Tap "Back" until you see this screen on your device and tap the object "Background", choose "Scripts".
1.) Add the above shown bricks and set the "Broadcast" - message to "start".
2.) Tap on the "play button" and enjoy your game.
